text: Need Joshua Hall for IKEA campaign. Budget around $34,883, looking for 3 x 30-second Instagram reel, 3 x Pinterest pin, 2 x 90-second product demo, 1 x Radio interview, 3 x 90-second product demo. 5 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 6 months.
